banner.quality: We build and renovate residential and commercial spaces. Casco or turn‑key. Clear SOW, schedule, and cost control.

toastify.success: Your message has been sent. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

proposedWorks.restorationDesc: Looking for a company with years of experience in restoration? You’ve come to the right place!
proposedWorks.renovationDesc: Building renovation or remodeling? See how we do it and who we have worked for.
proposedWorks.maintenanceDesc: We provide maintenance for various organizations, including government institutions.
proposedWorks.newConstructionDesc: Want to build something new? We are happy to assist with new construction or remodeling so you can enjoy it for years.

representation.title: Let us introduce ourselves
representation.text1: Witte Bouw has been specializing for decades in building maintenance, restoration, construction, and renovation — from small properties to (national) monuments in Amsterdam and the surrounding areas.
representation.text2: Quality and expertise always come first. We belong to a select group of experts certified as a 'Recognized Restoration Construction Company' and have worked on numerous historic buildings.
representation.text3: Our clients are diverse: from homeowners’ associations (VvEs) to (semi-)government institutions, housing corporations, investors, school managers, companies, or private individuals.
representation.text4: We also often work on behalf of architectural firms, structural engineers, or urban planners.
representation.text5: We do more than just execute beautiful construction projects. Our employees are passionate about their craft and attentive to detail. We support each other, laugh a lot, create solutions, and proactively contribute ideas. We make realistic plans, provide clear cost estimates, and communicate transparently.
representation.text6: Want to know more about our company? Click the button below.

prescription.text1: Experts in restoration, renovation, and maintenance since 1932
prescription.text4: High customer satisfaction according to bouwnu.nl
